title: Update error. Unspecified error has occurred please check logs

replies.body: I have been having the same problem. I attempted to update and got the message, uninstalled and reinstalled. Unsure of how to proceed, it seems no matter what I do or how patient I am with the update it continues to give this message. I've been trying to update and fix this for over 12 hours now.

Rather than checking your *Internet*, it's actually recommended you check your [**local network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as these issues are often caused by settings that conflict with League.

If you run into further issues with this, let me know so we can troubleshoot this further.
